article_title: Pentagon Grounds F-35 Fighter Jets as Fire Is Investigated
article_text:
The Pentagon late Thursday grounded its entire fleet of Lockheed Martin Corp. F-35 Joint Strike Fighter jets as it investigates the cause of a June 23 engine fire on one of the planes.

Additional inspections of the jets, which aren't yet in service, have been ordered following initial findings of the accident probe, the Defense Department said in a statement. "Return to flight will be determined based on inspection results and...
